author: leosimons
msg: Actually, multiple template languages is feature creep and violates KISS.

author: leosimons
msg: Implement more navigational support and move it into kid template.

* build, templates/site.kid.html, tabs.html: implement another kind of navigation ('tabs') and make the support for these kinds of navigational snippets the responsibility of the template instead of the responsibility of the main script.
* templates/site.kid.html: implement a basic www.apache.org-style layout / look-and-feel.

author: pietsch
msg: Fix doc regressions caused by marging back the 1.1 branch.

author: leosimons
msg: * xdocs/index.html: revert accidental commit of invalid html file.
